works.description:
The website www.murphyandcohen.com stole/scraped our entire site (www.equityinternational.com), did a global replace for the company name and are currently engaged in fraudulent activity using our website design, accomplishments and history. You will notice that our site is a WordPress site generated through php and mySQL queries, while their site is strictly HTML copies of our content. There are even still references to EI on the title page. They also replaced some of the Team and Management photos with stock images which can be found here:

Photos of bogus management team of Moretti and Murphy: http://www.murphyandcohen.com/category/nav/team/management/index.html

Here is where the image of “Richard A. Moretti” came from: http://parisiangentleman.co.uk/2009/12/26/italian-suits-which-shoulder-side-are-you-on/ 

Here is the where the image of “John A. Murphy” came from:   http://fr.dreamstime.com/photos-stock-young-man-in-suit-smiling-at-camera-image6869433

So in essence the entire site is in violation. All the images on our site are of our Chicago office. You will notice they have photoshopped a few images to remove our company name and logo.

Our profile with logo in bottom right: http://www.equityinternational.com/category/nav/company/profile-company/

Their profile with logo missing: http://murphyandcohen.com/category/nav/company/profile-company/index.html

Additionally, our Management Team and Founders are now showing up in Google search as being associated with this bogus/fraudulent company. Case in point: doing a Google search for one of our founders: "Gary R. Garrabrant" shows this company in the 5th hit.
